solution_line_template: {water_inflow_rate} gallons in minus {water_leak_rate} gallons out is {water_inflow_rate}-{water_leak_rate}=<<{water_inflow_rate}-{water_leak_rate}={net_flow_rate}>>{net_flow_rate} gallons per second
{basin_capacity} gallons divided by {net_flow_rate} gallons per second {basin_capacity}/{net_flow_rate} = <<{basin_capacity}/{net_flow_rate}={time_to_fill}>>{time_to_fill} seconds
